hero.title: Premium Indonesian Vanilla Export

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a trusted Indonesian vanilla exporter committed to delivering the highest quality vanilla beans worldwide. With decades of experience in sustainable farming and global distribution, we ensure every bean meets international standards.

organic.description: Certified organic vanilla beans grown without harmful chemicals

extract.title: Vanilla Extract

powder.title: Vanilla Powder
powder.description: Ground vanilla powder perfect for baking and cooking

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: We export our premium vanilla beans to over 30 countries worldwide, ensuring fresh delivery and consistent quality.
